author: nunocloth
content:
Hi, 
In Ethereum consensus, the XOR of the hash values of the block proposers' BLS signatures for the epoch numbers is used as the RANDAO value.
https://github.com/ethereum/annotated-spec/blob/master/phase0/beacon-chain.md#aside-randao-seeds-and-committee-generation
Is there a security proof for this? Also, why is the hash value of the BLS signature used instead of VRF? Thank you in advance!
